channel.title: CRAP! 100 errors problem!

item.title: CRAP! 100 errors problem!
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:8, topic:391866”][quote author=Coelho link=topic=489032.msg3575218#msg3575218 date=1303363699]
IDE’s often times can spot problems such as that, I suggest you use one. No one can actually pinpoint the problem within 30,000 lines of code.
[/quote]

Except when one look at the client.java reveals that the class declaration is missing, and probably a nice sized chunk of the code along with it.[/quote]
True true.

Read full topic

i dont have a backup T^T
thats the problem.

i dont really care though, i found a better source, and its PI.

item.title: CRAP! 100 errors problem!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Actually it turns out that you removed too much. You no longer define the class “client” anywhere.

Restore from a previous backup.

Read full topic

item.title: CRAP! 100 errors problem!
item.dc:creator: @OjamaBoy OjamaBoy
item.description:
@OjamaBoy wrote:

Ok, so i got the 100 errors problem when i tried to edit something on my server.
So i played it cool and removed all the new code in my files that i edited.
After that, i compiled again, but i still got the 100 errors.
I dont know what happened.
Someone help?
100 error compiler screen:
